Talents.Name: Nerve Corrosion
Talents.Description: Poisons the targets when attacking, dealing 125 Arts Damage to them per second, lasting 3 seconds (damage is doubled against Ranged enemies)

Talents.Name: Echoes of Ancestral Waves
Talents.Description: If this unit hasn't attacked for the last 2 seconds, restores 3.5% max HP every second
